QuestData.Title: Fate and Coincidence
QuestData.Description: There are two types of people in this world, $n. Those who believe in coincidence and those who don't.$B$BOn the day I lost my eyesight I was given the gift of clairvoyance. I suppose you can guess what sort of person I am.$B$BEarlier today, a young woman named Sasha was granted the same vision you were. You will want to talk to her.$B$BYou'll find her directly east of here at the White Pine Trading Post, on the way to Solstice Village.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Sasha at the White Pine Trading Post.
QuestData.RewardText: I was wondering when you'd turn up. Think you can give me a hand here?
